abort.already_configured: MELCloud integration already configured for this email. Access token has been refreshed.

reauth_confirm.description: The MELCloud integration needs to re-authenticate your connection details
reauth_confirm.title: Authentication expired for {name}

reconfigure.description: Reconfigure the entry to obtain a new token, for your account: `{username}`.
reconfigure.title: Reconfigure your MELCloud

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring MELCloud using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Ensure connection to MELCloud works and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the MELCloud YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration](/config/integrations/dashboard/add?domain=melcoud) manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The MELCloud YAML configuration import failed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.description:
Configuring MELCloud using YAML is being removed but there was an authentication error importing your YAML configuration.

Correct the YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the MELCloud YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration](/config/integrations/dashboard/add?domain=melcoud) manually.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.title: The MELCloud YAML configuration import failed

position.description: Horizontal vane position. Possible options can be found in the vane_horizontal_positions state attribute.
position.name: Position

position.description: Vertical vane position. Possible options can be found in the vane_vertical_positions state attribute.
position.name: Position
